Reviews.Content: When we checked into the hotel, the front office smelled terribly of very strong food. It was difficult to take even just checking in, but then we went up to the room. The smell up there was even worse! We stayed for about 20 minutes, I thought I could get used to it but I could not. When we tried to get a different room, it was not easy. Finally we got a new one and it did not smell. However, we found black hair clippings on the windowsill in the bathroom and a clump 8 inch long black hairs in the bathtub! Overall, it was a terrible experience and we were totally grossed out!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean & comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bgraham65
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff. I usually stay one night a week (business) and have always stayed in a clean and comfortable room.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent: Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: psyprofessr
Reviews.Content: Wonderful people, warm and friendly service, great location, as a very frequent travelor, Easy 15 minute drive from LAX - 5 minutes from Redondo, Hermosa and Manahattan Beaches. 45 Min to Hollywood, Disney. The best bed I have ever slept in. Nice parking area and landscaping. The Del Amo Mall is very close and has everything you could want in the way of shopping, PF Chang's and Ra (Japanese). The parking is easy and safe - in and out, you can't go wrong with this Rodeway. Daniel

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is clean and neat.”
Reviews.Author: 2Wanderers08
Reviews.Content: The service we experienceed at this Rodeway Inn & Suites was exceptional. We did have a few problems when we first arrived (toilet & TV) and the manager/owner responded immediately and correcteed all problems. The room was well decorated and clean. The location was in proximity to the Santa Monica Pier which was our true destination. We liked the manager/owner the best because he was so congenial and part we liked least was the outside entrance rather than the hallway entrance. We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Quality Service & Very clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Solis22
Reviews.Content: upon entering the business office you are greeted with a smile. The rooms are clean and nice. Makes you feel nice, cozy and more important safe. I rate this room top notch quality. I visit this site again and promote others to visit Sincerely B Solis

Reviews.Title: “Great room for the price!”
Reviews.Author: lingyd
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights for a trip in LA, the room is spacious and clean. No hidden fees like some other hotels. You even get a microwave and a fridge in the room! Nothing to blame considering the price!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: I_am_hungry00
Reviews.Content: My husband, young daughter and I were in Los Angeles for the New Year and were out of luck with hotels in the Hollywood area since no vacancy anywhere. So we found this hotel online and decided to give it a stay, even though it was a good 40 minute drive to our destination of Universal Studios. But it was worth the drive. Nice rooms, nice location, clean, and quiet. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Don't judge the book by it's cover”
Reviews.Author: lovingmystay
Reviews.Content: Cliche but yes, but trust me the rooms (especially the ones with indoor bath) are luxurious and extremely clean. The room temperature is flexible with a highly functioning AC/Heater. You will definitely be satisfied. The location is amazing as well. It's right next to numerous restaurants and multiple CVS's. Whatever you need, you can find nearby. I am definitely coming back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money in LA”
Reviews.Author: JonathanKong
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights with parents and my wife during our 2-week long California road trip. Booked online and when we got to the hotel, the owner already had key cards and registration ready for us. Hence check-in was absolutely painless and efficient. Plenty of parking spaces with good lighting. The room was kept very clean with adequate toiletry and towels. WiFi worked flawlessly and we were able to do VoIP without any lags. It's not the closest to LA downtown but can't beat the value, friendliness and clean room. Will use again next time I'm in LA.

Reviews.Title: “AMONG THE MANY CHOICES...”
Reviews.Author: SCOTTPVESTAL
Reviews.Content: AMONG THE MANY CHOICES... Along Pacific Coast Highway around the Southbay curve area of Los Angeles we found the Rodeway Inn to one of the nicer inexpensive places to lay our heads when visiting family. It is in an area filled with a host of "old school" style motels straight out of the "good ol' days of family travel. Most of them however are severly outdated and fairly seedy in looks and accomodations. While The Rodeway won't top any lists as the fanciest hotel/motel in town, it makes up for it in comfort and cleanliness. The Sealy Posturpedic beds are sooo comfortable. The owner/manager has done some improvements to make the rooms nicer despite the down economy which is a wonderful thing when you don't have to spend much for a room yet you get a comfortable place to stay. We would definitely recommend this establishment to anyone looking for what I've described.

Reviews.Title: “clean,affordable and value for money”
Reviews.Author: nidhi39
Reviews.Content: An excellent value for money especially in LA.The hotel is clean, comfortable and has efficient staff.Located in a quiet area this hotel is specially apt for those who want to avoid traffic nightmares and the hustle and bustle of a big city.

Reviews.Title: “Clean affordable safe”
Reviews.Author: kxj2010
Reviews.Content: Reasonably priced motel. Newly remodeled. Would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Clean.”
Reviews.Author: arizona742
Reviews.Content: Not the biggest of rooms, but nicely renovated rooms with micro & frig. Pleasant staff.

Reviews.Title: “great eooms”
Reviews.Author: ange2943
Reviews.Content: this place is the best the rooms are very clean comes with flate screen tv hughe tubs nice big bed the front desk was extremly helpful i will diffently stay here again Richard Reves

Reviews.Title: “Clean, courteous, free wifi - and cheap!”
Reviews.Author: nadia415
Reviews.Content: The room and bathroom were clean and in good condition. Although I didn't have time to watch the large flat screen television, I really appreciated their wifi, desk, dining table, and quiet environment. The hotel is at a busy intersection, but form my room, I could hear nothing except the heater humming along. The cleaning staff and management were friendly, professional, and polite. I highly recommend this hotel for a comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best Stay for the Price”
Reviews.Author: cdrake50
Reviews.Content: This was an incredible value. The rooms are offered at a low motel price, but instead of a motel experience, the rooms have nice fixtures, and have a microwave and refrigerator--in general a very pleasant atmosphere. It also had free wi-fi, free parking, and a basic continental breakfast (sweetroll, juice, and coffee). The service is amazing. The manager was quick to meet our needs and always very nice. I would recommend this hotel, especially if you want a good place to stay for a low price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: 123tbham
Reviews.Content: T This place is clean, well appointed and very reasonably priced. They added additional parking spaces recently. Absolutely no complaints for a Los Angeles area motel in a urban setting without costing an arm and a leg.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, recently modernized, walking distance to restaurants, close to Conoco refinery”
Reviews.Author: rrimmer1
Reviews.Content: This place is conveniently located for out of town workers at the industrial facilities in San Pedro or Wilmington. Two story modernized building in commercial district of Harbor City. Several fast food resturants within 1 block, and additional places to eat along Pacific Coast Highway.

Reviews.Title: “I enjoyed my stay very much”
Reviews.Author: katehoo33
Reviews.Content: It's a great hotel concerning the price it charges. It's clean with a big comfortable bed. Service is good as well. I will strongly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean motel, pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: tina306090
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel because of its proximity to the UCLA-Harbor hospital. It was a very pleasant stay. The room and bathroom were clean and comfortable. The staff was excellent and friendly. The only downside is its location, with a topless bar right across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Small room, but nice”
Reviews.Author: tapakin
Reviews.Content: Room was small, but comfortable. A little bit noisy outside. Good service.

Reviews.Title: “Its very nice and staff is terrific”
Reviews.Author: philbrack
Reviews.Content: Everything is new and nice at the hotel. The staff is very helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably prices an excellent service.”
Reviews.Author: TravmackzA
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on holidays, all perfect, clean rooms good value and great service. Location does require a car but it's a safe neighbourhood with loads of restaurants nearby.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT customer service, clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bdormer
Reviews.Content: Very clean and comfortable rooms. I was especially impressed with Patel who went beyond the call of duty to make sure our stay was comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and safe place to rest your head”
Reviews.Author: hollym2311
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on Sunday 17 Oct 2010. Proprietor Mr Patel upgraded us to one of his best rooms on check-in, room was large, clean and comfortable, had everything we needed for a restful overnight stay. Price was good value, would recommend to travellers coming in to LA from the airport with a rental car - place was easy to find with a Garmin, plenty of restaurants nearby too.

Reviews.Title: “nice detour on a main road”
Reviews.Author: jennyaspot
Reviews.Content: We've been in the states over several weeks and had a two night stopover before flying home to Australia. We were pretty much over hotels, airlines and takeways and just wanted something reasonably priced not too far from the airport and long beach etc. We weren't too sure what to expect but have to say we were really impressed. The staff were great, unusually polite, the room was compact but confortable, very clean and recently refurbished, bed was great, free wireless, cable TV, A/C , bar fridge, microwave, tabel for two, an inbuilt and plenty of hot water with good pressure...great shower! Plenty of granite too. Like any LA hotel the noise is an issue but suspect the rooms back from the balcony are quieter. WE found ear plugs a very simple solution if the hum of the A/c or bar fridge doesn't drown the noise. While the location wasn't Beverly Hills we felt very safe and I was down at the car several times late at night and alwaysduring There was a basic breakfast which seemed ok but we were too tired to care., For two homesick travellers it was very good!

Reviews.Title: “Will Be returning!”
Reviews.Author: SwannysWB
Reviews.Content: We had picked this hotel after reading reviews on Tripadvisor. We had made the reservations the night before when we were in Santa Cruz. We wound up arriving very late, which I had my son call ahead to let them know and it was no problem. When we arrived, Mr. Patel was very friendly and quickly checked us in. We were only going to stay for two nights, but the kids wanted to stay a few extra days and it wasn't a problem. We found a local laundromat down the road and an excellent bakery as well which made our stay even better! Each night when we would come back from sightseeing, we would stop at the 7-11 pick up our snacks and head back. The only problem with parking was, if you got in to late, you had to park in the overflow lot which faces a "seedy" hotel. Everything is a short drive. I personally am not a big freeway driver, so we found all the backroads to get places. Venice Beach is about 20 minute ride depending on traffic and Knotts Berry Farm was 15 minutes away. The oil change place across the street was nice too. The only problem we had with Mr. Patel was he thought my son was smoking in a non smoking room. I told him that he was going outside by the ashtray and smoking and while we were there, we emptied the ashtrays for him, which it was the least we could do. Breakfast was ok, it was packaged Danish that you would pick up from Sam's Club, so if you have the chance, venture down the block to the little bakery and pick up a stuffed crossiant. On one of the nights, we had noise people in the room above us. I let Mr. Patel know and he said when we come back he will put us on the second floor. So if you want peace and quiet, request a 2nd floor because when you are on the first floor, you can hear everything! Parents should tell there children to be respectfull of the people around them, my kids are teenagers and still get mad at me when I tell them to be quiet because of neighbors. We will be staying here again as the rates are fair!!!

Reviews.Title: “Superbly Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Mession
Reviews.Content: I had the opportunity to stay at this Rodeway and was extremely pleased. Not only was the location good but everything else as well. The room was fantastic, meticulously maintained. I had all the comforts of home including refrigerator, microwave etc. I was especially pleased with the large flat screen TV since my eyesight isnt what it used to be, Breakfast is a bit slim but it was sufficient enough to take care of that morning hunger. I would absolutely recommend this Rodeway without hesitation!!. Excellent place!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Service”
Reviews.Author: spgirl52
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed this hotel very much. Me and my boyfriend always come here when he comes into town. The hotels are kept clean and well maintained. I stayed once in the jacuzzi room and i did not want to leave! I really enjoyed my stay and i always look forward to come back. The man at the front desk is also really helpful and kind. I recommend if you want a nice, not too pricey, digital cable, LCD TV room, come to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best motels I've been to”
Reviews.Author: jpark83
Reviews.Content: First, if you are looking for a high class hotel, this is not your place to stay. This place is a top value motel in a very conveniently located area in the Los Angeles area. From my experience, this motel was excellent in every way possible. The rooms were very clean, the owner resolved every issue I've had, and even gave me a discount for the two nights I stayed at the end of my one week trip in LA. Parking was free, there was WI-FI internet that was free, and breakfast was free. Since this is a small hotel, you can't really dine in the lounge as there are no tables. I didn't mind that at all since I could always take it into my room. There are many shops around that area (Pacific Coast Highway in itself is a pretty big road), including CVS, many gas stations, and many eateries. All in all, this place grows on you and you will get the best value out of this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: mrtumnus777
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. My family is in LA to check out Catalina Island and also the Griffith's Observatory. Our room was squeaky clean. The hotel was remodeled 3 years ago and they have done a nice job maintaining the property. We had a nice bathroom, flat screen TV, fridge and microwave. Maid service came everyday and replenished towels and tp's. Mr. Patel gave excellent and attentive customer service. There is free parking we felt like our car was safe. Next time we are in LA, we'll stray here again and will recommend this place to family and friends. Great place for people who needs a hotel before they hit the cruise. Long beach port is 17 minutes away.

Reviews.Title: “OUTSTANDING”
Reviews.Author: LenniBono
Reviews.Content: My name is Leonard and I just wanna say...Oh...My...God... My stay @ Rodeway Inn & Suites in Harbor City, CA was simply FANTASTIC!!! Me and my wife stayed in the jacuzzi suite for 2 nights. I made the reservations my self because it was a surprise weekend getaway. So, I let my wife walk in the room first that way I'll get a TRUE reaction from her. And when I heard her say "ALLL BAAABY"... I knew right there she loved it... The room was SUPER clean, usually I always bring clorox wipes with me to go over some things... But there was no need this time. Mr. Patel is the name of the guy at the front desk, he always gave me service with a smile. AND! He gave me 2 options of jacuzzi rooms to choose from when I arrived... I mean who does that, usually you have to take whats given to you... But, not Mr. Patel... he was so helpful througout my entire stay... I needed extra towels....NO PROBLEM... I forgot my toothpaste from home... Hey...NO PROBLEM... Mr. Patel was able to supply me with anything I needed... I even got lost on the way there and he helped me with directions also... The cost was SO reasonable to stay at a place so nice, clean and smelling good... Flat screen TV with all the HBO channels, microwave, and refrigerator that we did make good use of. Me and my wife was out all that day... Came back and the cleaning ladies had cleaned the room SO to my liking, and NOTHING WAS MISSING IF YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN. I say that because at other hotels I've stayed at i've experience a few missing things... But, Rodeway Inn & Suites in Harbor City ROCKS! Mr. Patel ROCKS! I took pictures of the jacuzzi suite and I will be posting them on FaceBook so I can show all my friends and family... Thanks Mr. Patel... You made our weekend Buddy!

Reviews.Title: “Best of the Best!”
Reviews.Author: Vicki0820
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in hundreds of hotels and this was by far the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed at. In addition to the remarkable clean room it had everything you could ask for. A fridge, microwave, free wireless internet... and of course a great price. The staff was wonderful and upon check in we were greeted by the owner. He went out of his way to make sure our room was ready and then proceeded to help us up to our room. There is nothing negative I can say about our stay. My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay and if we are ever in the area again will be back at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal On Pacific Coast Highway”
Reviews.Author: Stewart556
Reviews.Content: For the price there is no other place on this street that can match this place. I drove up and down PCH asking for rates and asking about rooms. This location was very close to the freeway, and it came with alot of ammenities other hotels didnt have in the area. The rooms come with queen size beds, a microwave, and refridgerator. It has over 250 channels of cable TV so we didn't miss our favorite shows. Most hotels only have basic channels. It has excellent wifi internet free with your stay. Free continential breakfast and a news paper on you door each day and free local phone calls. Patel the manager is very attentive. When we asked for something it was if he worked only for us. The room was cleaned daily and parking was a snap. The weekly rate can't be touched.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: revtrp10
Reviews.Content: I have chosen this motel based on all of the TripAdvisor reviews and after spending last 4 nights there (Rm 214) can confirm their accuracy. For overall value I would rate my stay in the top 10% of the last 80+ nights spent across Western US/Canada ($50-200/night) with a particular emphasis on the flexible and helpful manager who adds to an overall very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and cheap staying.”
Reviews.Author: Nebu1a
Reviews.Content: We planned our staying here at the last, and we found a cheap accommodation here. Our room was very comfortable and clean, with a good TV and a complimentary wi-fi connection. Besides, the manager was very kind and helpful. The position of this hotel is very good too, since it takes not that much to reach the beach, by car or by bus. We only missed the laundry, but we found one not too far from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and friendly at an affordable price.”
Reviews.Author: tfcat
Reviews.Content: The staff was extrememly friendly and helpful. They made sure our stay was comfortable and answered any questions we had. The room, including the bathroom, was clean; the room itself was spacious, quiet, and comfy. WiFi was free and easy to access, parking was also free and offered plenty of spaces to accomodate all of the guests.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Room, Great Management, Will Definitely Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: kristincherie
Reviews.Content: The management/owner of this hotel was extremely helpful, competent and friendly. We had a somewhat confusing check-in situation and he knew exactly what to do was was extremely courteous. We stayed three nights, checking in on a Friday, leaving on Monday. The room was extremely clean and looked recently remodeled. I was impressed with the energy efficiency of the hotel. You have to place your room key in a card slot near the door to activate the lights so when you leave, the lights automatically shut off. Everyday we were there, we saw the owner working around the business and he always asked if everything was ok and if we needed anything. The location of the hotel is great. It's right on Pacific Coast Highway and was centrally located to all the places we needed to be. The only complaint I have is the parking lot was rather small with tight spaces. It was a little hard to park the car. Overall, the quality of customer service received is the main reason I will definitely choose this hotel again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “OH MY GOD”
Reviews.Author: mizgee1
Reviews.Content: I know you wouldn't usually use a hotel in this area in the same sentance as The Bellagio and Mandalay Bay but having stayed here I can. The rooms are beautiful marble floors, posturpedic beds, and a great price. I found this hotel by accident and will never stay anywhere else when I am in the area. The hotel is in e great location a few miles from the beach end close to the Harbor freeway which allows you to go anywhere in Los Angeles easily. The rooms are so beautiful and clean and service is polite and quick. If your looking for a great deal this is the place, trust me.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Peter28
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Los Angeles for a week during our trip through California. We found this hotel through Tripadvisor and it was all that we have hoped for! The location of the hotel is good. Do not expect it to be on walking distance of the beaches or the Hollywood Hills but if you have a car (and to be honest, if you want to cover all that LA has to offer, a car is required) it is near the highway and it is about a 20 minutes drive to Santa Monica/Venice and a 25 minutes drive to Beverly Hills/Hollywood. Overall, I would consider the location to be good. Furthermore, there are some dining facilities at walking distance such as Denny's, Subway, Taco Bell, and a rich diversity of hamburger fastfood restaurants. The exterior of the hotel is well-maintained and the rooms are spacious. The room and bathroom are well-equiped (e.g. a bath, hairdryer, flatscreen television, refridgerator, microwave, etc.) and clean. The rooms have free wireless internet and the hotel offers free orange juice, coffee, and some sweet stuff such as donuts for breakfast in the morning. Finally, the service of the staff is outstanding. Any question is promptly adressed by the friendly staff. Do not expect a five star hotel, but this hotel truly offers a great package for a very modest rate.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: CoachPaulbball
Reviews.Content: Although,upon arrival the location does appear to be less than attractive,the area turned out to be safe and convenient.There are any number of food choices close to the property including a fresh fish place 3 minutes walk away.The quality of the beds,and particular the linens were shockingly high:soft,immaculately clean and comforting;flat screen tv with good cable selection,well cared for room and bathroom,and a can do/hands on/hard working manager Mr.Patel made the experience excellent.I should mention,to be completely forthcoming,that the "continental"breakfast is juice,coffee and packaged danish,which is actually fine for me,but if you need a big breakfast,go to Denny's!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: Prickly
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of its good reviews and haven't been disappointed. Rates are very reasonable for a well situated hotel. The room and bathroom are small, but very clean and recently refurbished with granite tiles in the bathroom. They offer flat screen TV, HBO, free WiFi and good air conditioning which masks the traffic noise from Pacific Coast Highway. We slept soundly. Added bonus - management is friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay for a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: nyrkik
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my wife and two children (ages 12 & 14) for two nights. I settled on this hotel because I could get a room with two double beds at no additional costs. This is important because I do not like getting two rooms if I don't need to, but we need two beds that are larger than twins. The hotel is nothing special, most of the reviews are accurate enough, so much of what I say has already been said. But I rely on folks adding their 2 cents here at Tripadvisor to make my decisions, thus it is only fair that I contribute as well. Basically the hotel is clean, the beds were comfortable, as I said the prices was reasonable and I have no real complaints. It is next to a fairly busy road but surprisingly the noise did not bother us at all. Part of that I think was due to the A/C, you know, your standard loud hotel unit. Not complaining about the A/C sound, just saying it helped cover some of the traffic noise. The door looked fairly solid as well and I think that helped with limiting the street noise. The surrounding area does seem a little rundown but no one bothered us and I didn't feel uncomfortable. There is a McDonald's right across the street and a Jack in the Box next to that. That's good because the complimentary breakfast is barren. Coffee and some packaged danishes. There was a grocery store, Albertsons, about three blocks down, we shopped there for some food. A couple of other cons: The parking lot was tight, there was no laundry on site (there was a laundry about a mile down the road) and it is a little far from downtown. A couple of other pros: As I said, the room was clean and the beds were comfortable. Much of the room had seen some remodeling in the recent past. And free internet is always a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: jlbcable
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised with this hotel. The room was comfortable and very quite. The bathroom was beautifully tiled and looked new. With reading all the reviews for this hotel I would agree that for the price I paid I was pleasantly surprised with how clean big and quiet the room was. The only negative I have is that the website said coffee maker in the room and there was not one. I am a morning coffee drinker and need one! Other than that the stay was excellent. Staff was extremelly friendly, accomodating and seemed to enjoyed being there, which these days in itself is a "pleasant surprise"!

Reviews.Title: “Rodeway Inn, Pacific Coast Highway, great value, friendly, nice!”
Reviews.Author: Luruma
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Rodeway Inn on Pacific Coast Highway in Harbor City, CA. Recently remodeled, clean rooms, comfy bed with pillowtop and enery saving lights. Quiet A./C as well. The manager, Patel, was very freindly and had a great smile and helpful attitude. We enjoyed our stay there and the price value was great!!! We also were happy to see so many conveniences nearby, easy ride into L.A. beach areas, and a restaurant serving vegetarian dishes about a block away. Easy freeway access too. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean room nice and neat”
Reviews.Author: love101_047
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean and neat and customer service was great.My name is Darrel greene and I recommend this room.Feel free to contact me about this room darrelgreene@pacbell.net.Thanks

Reviews.Title: “had extra shopping money! woo!”
Reviews.Author: ziggyaroundtheworld
Reviews.Content: We stayed there because I screwed up my other reservation and my husband had stayed there during business travel. He spoke highly of it even though it was a very simple hotel and the area didn't look too great. I was pleasantly surprised. The staff was great. The room service was impeccable. Even though the area looks questionable, the manager was always looking out to see who came in or out of the hotel and we felt very safe to leave our rental there every night. It isn't too far driving to L.A. or any of the surrounding popular beaches and cities, probably about 20 minutes to L.A. and Disneyland, maybe 30. We stayed there for a week and with the money we saved on hotel we had extra shopping money! The room is a little small but we only were there to sleep so it wasn't a big deal and nobody complained. I would recommend even to small families and definitely to people traveling with friends and couples. Oh... almost forgot to mention, the internet was always working and really fast, another plus in my book and of course free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel at a Cheap Price”
Reviews.Author: KINCER327
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. Good price, Clean room, Close to the beach, Friendly Staff.

Reviews.Title: “Surprising inside in plain wrapper.”
Reviews.Author: jamboree89
Reviews.Content: We stayed one Friday night to allow us to catch a cruise ship from Los Angeles on Saturday, as it was between LAX and only 5 miles from the cruise port. Very clean room and bath with very good bed and surprisingly quiet. Showed signs of recent remodeling. Great mexican food restaurant just around the corner for dinner and a good cafe about 3 blocks west for breakfast. I would recommend it to my friends. The outside is plain and pink. Paid $62.00.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING”
Reviews.Author: liptea33
Reviews.Content: Normally I don't write reviews but, I have to say this hotel is absoutely amazing.. The management team was very freindly and warm. Upon entering the room I was totally blown-away. i would recomment this place to all my business associates, and friend/family.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: npgirl
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and welcoming. It didn't have that funny smell that alot of hotel rooms have when you walk in. The bed/bedsheets were very comfortable, soft, and clean. The bathroom had new marble counter and tiles, the shower was large and had great pressure. TV was great- a large flat screen on the wall. Love that the hotel is conserving energy- the lights will only stay on if you are in the room cause you have to put your card key in place from them to come on. The people running the place are very friendly and accomodating. Only negative I can think of is the small/awkward parking lot and no pool or hot tub.

Reviews.Title: “Great service with a great price”
Reviews.Author: DavidsonHKDMED
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed one night at Rodeway Inn & Suites for a wedding at Redondo Beach. While the hotel was not situated in the greatest location, it was a quick drive down Pacific Coast Highway to Redondo Beach. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We were also offered free breakfast and coffee in the morning. We received very good service for a low price! Our room was very clean and had plenty of space for us. The night was very peaceful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area who would like a good room and good service for a low price.

Reviews.Title: “excellent room and amenities as well as the staff. we always go back here keep up the good work guys”
Reviews.Author: victorSanPedro
Reviews.Content: You have an excellent hotel and staff. I feel very comfortable and safe here. I've already recommended this hotel to my friends and one of them visited already and gave me a very good feedback about you. Hope you will continue doing the same in a consistent manner.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: redlen
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been completely been refurbished and is very modern for the price. Great staff and comfortable beds. My only complaint is that ice machine that charged .50 cents for ice.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect Hotel stay no doubt!”
Reviews.Author: rigorojasjr
Reviews.Content: The hotel room is extremely clean which gives you the comfortable feeling of being at home with the added luxuries. Completely private stay with all of one's personal needs already thought of and included in each room. If someone would ask me if I know of a good hotel to stay for their night, I would immediately recommend the best I know by far, Rodeway Inn & Suites on Pacific Coast Hwy. in Los Angeles, California.

Reviews.Title: “My stay here was an overall great stay.”
Reviews.Author: gisselhef
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times before and still continue to come because of the hotel's excellent service. The experience was fantastic. The rooms were always clean and stocked, the staff was always friendly and concerned about making your stay even better, and the prices are reasonable. The location is conveniently located by food places and attractions. Like I said the rooms are awesome, but the customer service is even better. The staff treat you really good and that's why we keep coming back.

Reviews.Title: “My visit which was subsidized by the Red Cross”
Reviews.Author: momonrye
Reviews.Content: As of recent, I was involved in a fire at my residence. We were evacuated and assisted by the Red Cross. The Red Cross through painstaking efforts did everything within their scope of budget and resources. The hotel they sent us to was the Rodeway Inn and Suites on the highway in Harbor City at the Western/ PCH grid. I must say, my stay (from 5/3 through to 5/11) was as comfortable and accomadating as a hotel can be. I got my rest and was always refreshed after a good hot shower. The hallways are very clean and the rooms are very comfortalbe. This particular hotel is remodeled from when they took over the property from the "Travelodge". The attitude of the people at the desk was superlative and treated me like royalty. This hotel I hightly recommend for urban proffesionals and travelers who like a clean and sensible environment.. They were of tremendous assistance at a time when things could have gone in any direction. Thank you Rodeway INN. Cheers, David Houlgate (stayed in Rooms 208 and 218)

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel at a Great Price”
Reviews.Author: harborcitytravel
Reviews.Content: Newly remodeled rooms that are very nice and at the right price. Super friendly staff that provide excellent service. Everything clean and nice with wireless internet, iron, hairdryer, great shower, flat-screen tvs, and cable, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: roadkingraider
Reviews.Content: Good service. Rooms clean. excellent showers. Water pressure premium.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad”
Reviews.Author: sumivida
Reviews.Content: This hotel isn't located in the best area but wasn't to bad for the short notice that we were given to attend a funeral. The staff was excellent and went out of there way to make sure we had everything that we requested upon arrival.

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed our trip. Set time you next time.”
Reviews.Author: tamtam101
Reviews.Content: We travel to this area quit frequently for work at the oil refinery's, sometimes for long periods of time, and have to stay close to the job site. For this location this has been by far the best hotel stay yet. Service as been excellent and office personal accommodated us in every way they could. Ill definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and Very Clean!”
Reviews.Author: CatalinaRunner
Reviews.Content: Excellent location and the cleanest motel I'v e stayed in on my trip out west!

Reviews.Title: “stay here before you travel to the cruise terminal”
Reviews.Author: laurend77
Reviews.Content: I booked a room here for my boyfriend and I, the night before we left for a NCL cruise down the mexican riveria. I was searching and searching on the internet...not sure if we should stay by the airport and get a cab the next day or travel right away to the port. but the rooms were so expensive everywhere. i found this place on the AAA website and it was so cheap! it was about a $50 cab ride from the airport and then it was only about 10 minutes to the cruise terminal the next morning. (you can't walk it however, you have to take another cab). dont be fooled by the outside-- the rooms are great inside...fairly new, big shower, very clean! and the people here are so nice... we waited outside for our cab and they offered to turn on the air conditioning if we wanted to come inside. we said we were fine, but they turned it on anyway just incase. there is a lot of fast food restaurants around-- it was a perfect scenario for us, since we arrived around midnight and left at 10am the next day.

HotelInfo.Name: Rodeway Inn & Suites Pacific Coast Highway
HotelInfo.Address: 1665 West Pacific Coast Highway, Los Angeles, CA 90710
